Description:
Set strategic long and short-term for architecture engineering department goals and evaluate outcomes
Motivate and inspire section heads and staff while facilitating personal growth
Manage and coordinate a good relation between architecture design department and technical office and site departments.
Ensure high levels of productivity are maintained in architecture designs for all projects.
Guarantee the highest levels of quality of design drawings are met.
Foster a productive working environment
Establish adherence to company and industry regulations
Responsible to submit all required design drawings as per a project plan.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor degree in architecture engineering ( Only )
Proven work experience in real estate as a Design Manager .
Self-motivated and confident.
Highly organized and diligent.
Exceptional interpersonal skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication.
